value: return '';
return '';
//on first call we need load next page
// diplay the first page of users on page load or when the filters change
// set the next page to be requested to 2 since the first page is in the memory
// saving the other half to be displayed later
// set users to undefined as the script is triggered when click on load more users button
// and to prevent this block of code from being executed (prevent resetting the displayedUsers)
// add next page of users to the list of next users to display
// display the next users from the memory
// when there are no more users in the memory
return user.firstname && user.lastname ? user.firstname + " " + user.lastname : user.userName;
return uiTranslate("Another user already exists with this username. Choose a different username.");
return uiTranslate("Access denied. For more information, check the log file.");

description: This page allows to manage the users. It is dedicated to Administrator-like profiles. You can export it and edit it in the UI Designer.
